item.description:
Join us at the home of Alex and Tumeria to watch “Eating” with a brief health study session to follow (many of us are interested finding more about Omega 3 and 6 but we’ll go with what the majority chooses) and Potluck.

The “Eating” DVD by Mike Anderson is very well done highlighting the benefits of a plant based diet and is ”used in wellness clinics through out the world to motivate people to change their diets and restore their health.”

What to bring: A vegan entrée or appetizer (or beverage!)

Parking: Park along side of Mill St., which is at the end of Pine St.

My cell phone # is 508-361-7978, just incase you need it.

See you there!
item.name: Showing of "Eating" DVD and Potluck
